title.label: The best mobile game Iâ€™ve ever played

content.label: I first found this game when the Ouya was new, and from the point of view of someone who can never find a good mobile game to play, Iâ€™ve bought this on at least 3 different platforms, and should it eventually reach console, Iâ€™ll most likely buy it there too. I donâ€™t know what it is about this game that is so addicting, but the â€˜70s score-centered type of gameplay, combined with the high speeds youâ€™d only experience drifting the touges of Mt. Akina, while still keeping the aesthetic of the game very simple yet very informative of what is happening around you... itâ€™s something I have yet to experience through any medium. This game is a blessing, yet a curse - a reminder of what no other game has ever strived to achieve and probably never will again.

If youâ€™re into fast pace runners, Indy style art, and intensely psychedelic games...then THIS is for you! A challenging game that gets more satisfying the better you get. Each level is more like a trip than the last, fantastic. My only â€œcomplaintâ€ would be the number of levels. Even with only the 8 levels included itâ€™s very much worth the money. Double player mode is a whole new level of visually spectacular. Developers! Please, more levels!
add iphone x support!

title.label: Music will cut out at will

content.label: At some points during game play the games music will stop. Please fix this
The very simplistic art style combined with the relaxing music adds an element thats essential to indie runner games. Very nice

I installed the game earlier today and by golly is it fun. Me being a fan of games like Super Hexagon, WaveWave, and Boson X, this game is almost a dream come true! One thing that really bugs me, however, is that the timer and score at the bottom of the screen are hidden if you use your right hand to play! If the devs could put an option to swap the score and timers to the left side, that would make this game even more awesome than it is.

The description really gave me high expectations of the game. Itâ€™s really not worth the money. Maybe Iâ€™m used to different controls. Itâ€™s still a pretty cool game, but I definitely wouldnâ€™t spend money on it. The controls are hard(didnâ€™t play much, but if you like simple controls like me you wouldnâ€™t like it) and the description really made it sound amazing. Iâ€™ve had other games like this, FOR FREE, except they werenâ€™t first person and the controls are easy.

title.label: Great game want a Apple TV version

content.label: Great game and I have bought the game now twice. Since the other version I bought is on a console that doesnâ€™t exist anymore I want a Apple TV version so I can play on my TV as well

title.label: game is amazing, I have a color hack too!

content.label:
So I literally just got this game to help out with my insomnia based off the simplicity of the design and animation type. So far I love it and the music is super relaxing, you can also play your own if you prefer that. 

The color hack I used was simple and it doesnâ€™t require what your phone doesnâ€™t already have. I use this also just to change the mood of my phone. Lol add smart contrast and reduce white point and youâ€™ll have a dope looking color scheme for all Apple stock apps.

For this game Go to settings>general>accessibility>display accommodations[turn it on]>color filters>turn the intensity up> then change the hue to whatever color options you like. Once thatâ€™s done go back to the game and the white lines will now be filled with the hue that you chose for your phone.

Quick tip:
Enable accessibility shortcuts and triple tapping will make this so much faster to turn on and off once the hue is set.

Hope you guys enjoy this game as much as I do! 

P.s- Iâ€™m thinking about doing a vlog on live app reviews using the new screen recording feature in the new iOS 11 update. Let me know if you enjoy this tip!
Almost as primitive as the retro 8 bit games but never as popular - this vector graphics style game is fun enough, but it's no asteroids...

It's a very addictive game its hard, i have to play the same level for to many time in order to complete it.
And thats what I like about it
Not worth the price
Amazing game, I have never played anything like this. It looks so much different from anything Iv seen and its a lot of fun to play. Wish it had more levels but thats the only complaint I have. 5/5!
Endless is my favorite.
This is a great game
I almost never download games but got lucky on this one! Definitely worth a few bucks ðŸ˜€
Lit af

Fun and Visually Stunning, however the lack of levels can make this game become rather boring once completed. I encourage the developers of this great game to make more levels. Maybe even perhaps a music mode that goes with music?
Looks good but each board designed for you to die at a point, apparently. Not worth paying for.
I'm not usually into games but this one is beautifully designed.
The endless mode is the only one I tried but it totally blows.
i love this game, but i do wish it had more levels.

title.label: Unique design. Multiplayer is nice touch

content.label: The first person gameplay is what makes this game stand out from any other endless runner. I like the fact that there is an option to play with 2 people, but not online. Adding an online multiplayer option would make the game that much better. Overall pretty good game but not worth original price

It's a very stylized black and white endless runner. If that's your thing, this is your game. For me, boring and uninspired gaming with decent visuals and music doesn't cut it. Deleted after ten minutes of trying to like it. Glad it was on sale.
This game is so fun to play the graphics are brilliant and it is a great game for me to play on long boring flights

title.label: Not as impressed as I'd thought

content.label: I got this way back when it was only a buck the reason I got it that and it was no IAPs so I guess that these days makes it above average on principle alone pay once and play never worry about $ again that's how my generation was raised we bought a game and actually owned the full content and the most popular games either got sequels and in rare cases expansion packs. So 4stars if you like runners you should enjoy this its not that temple run clone either it's a new IP so to speak as idk anything else like it a first person runner just wished it were more parkour based instead of hard to judge jump range to speed stuff I'd rather have wall runs and pauses or like swing on a poll like they do in Olympics that'd be great in updates. Then maybe I'd rate it 5star as it'd be like the real mirror edge of iOS only wireframe and no guys shooting at you. Add some parkour moves and stunts and it's got potential to become the 5star but as is it's too hyped up and I fell for that so its not for everyone just maybe actually go watch some gameplay reviews on YouTube or twitch or something if anyone streams this then decide whether it's for you cuz I didn't enjoy it nearly as much most likely due to the hype got my hopes set too high ergo I was let down as it didn't match its hype. It's not bad by any means but it's still something that I ended up playing a few hours less than 10 for sure maybe like 5 collective and deleted for space it is large for what it is. Oh also it's extremely difficult very very hard game so that is another thing that turned me off I couldn't progress anymore kept restarting some check points would be very helpful please. And people we must be more critical of our games if we want more as far as quality goes if we want the very best it can be then we need demand it and support those that meet its true potential. Games like this need a demo cuz then I may not have bought & had my buyers remorse for that $1 but live n learn I'm also attracted to anything psycodellic too so
Arcade runner game changer. Unsung astonishing app. Buy once play forever.
C'mon!!

title.label: fantastic gaming experience for mobile platform

content.label: lovely graphics and beautiful accompanying musical score, long shelf-life with arcade levels and endless modes, perfect both for serious gaming experience &or for killing time in a waiting area - a perfect mobile game, in a time when we're producing fewer than usual at best.

Let's start off by saying, this game looks phenomenal! I have played temple run and stuff like that before but they never felt super rewarding because it was just the same thing over and over again. But Fotonica, all the levels look amazing and it makes you feel accomplished when you complete a level. Speaking of the levels, they are not easy, but not challenging. I say that because, if you are a casual gamer like me it won't drive you insane trying to beat the level. But if you don't pay attention to the jumps (like me cause I love how the levels look) then it won't be a walk in the park. I don't want to make it seem like this is the best art work I have ever seen for a game, but it is just how the back ground changes and makes you eyes wander all over the screen. It's just an amazing game if you like temple run but hate the repetitiveness and want something were to look up(not trying to say temple run is bad, it's just my opinion)
Games like these deserve way more popularity
Beautiful and simple. Well worth the price.
Stopped playing because music stopped working inside of levels.
I really like this game but as the other review said, the music does not play during the entire game. Please fix it!
Its great and beautiful. But for some reason and I dont have music during gameplay. I have sounds but not music. And I checked the settings of course.

Optimicen la App para iOS 9. No hay sonido...
Excelente juego pero no da ganas de jugarlo asÃ­.

The graphics are cool, and it's hard to tell what's happening in the preview. So I bought the game. Turns out nothing it happening in the preview. Graphics look promising but all you do is run straight forward and jump. No turns, no interacting with the cool geometry. It's really flat gameplay and boring as hell. There should be other directions to move and more dynamic interaction with surroundings. I'm surprised by the high rating for this game. Very disappointed that I spent $3. Now I'm reading more of the reviews and... Guess what Apple. It's clear that the developers have paid for 5 star reviews. So now you have the problem that Amazon has, 5-star reviews can't be trusted ever.
I don't understand what I'm doing, it's confusing, and I don't suggest this to people. This might be a good game for someone else but not me.
Fix the app icon! Flat design is in and 3D is out.

The things that make me like I mean love this game is the style of the graphics and also the style of gameplay this is one of the best appstore games ever and in all the game is just really creative completely worth the money you will spend.: )

First, I want to mention that I hate endless runner games. But that's not what this is. Though there is an endless level, the game is not like anything I've ever played before. It's challenging, but not so difficult that it's impossible. 

It's such a great concept and it's totally addictive! It feels like you are in the game and running and jumping at 70 miles an hour. It's brilliant. It's the best game I've played in a long time! Beautifully and cleverly designed! I wasn't sure and waited for a long time to buy it. I'm SO HAPPY I gave it a chance. I can't stop playing. 
If you're interested enough to read this review, then stop reading and download it NOW! ðŸ’–

The game is great and unique and fun but it would be nice if we had an extra set of levels to run through! The game is a bit short at the moment with only 8 levels. And more infinite levels too! We just want more because it's awesome!

I thought this game looks different and being a runner fan, I checked it out. And ...yeah, it does look unique, but I don't feel the usual excitement from runners. Where are my upgrades? Vehicles? Costumes? You know, unlockables? Sure, there are different routes to take and when it gets fast it's pretty wild, but that alone is not enough to keep me interested I suppose. Music is meh. If I want a fast runner I'd go for Boson X.

The game is ver fun! It's challenging and players of any skill level can play. I hope in the more challenges will come out with future updates. If recommend the game for s good pass time or wanting fun.
The crash is real with this one. Fix it.. ðŸ˜’
This app takes up more memory than any other app on my phone, including all 3D games. Ridiculous, since it could likely be made to take up MUCH less. Not even that good of a game.

I love this game. It has awesome graphics and a futuristic feel. My only complaint is that I beat all the levels on the first day. I hope the next update brings some new levels. Overall it's a great game.
Very goooooodd!!!! I love this game!
Please fix the hand animation on the vs option. Otherwise amazing game!
